. In an exclusive interview with ABC's Diane Sawyer , Donald Rumsfeld concedes that`` it's possible'' that decisions on how many troops to send into Iraq marked the biggest mistake of the war. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld told Diane Sawyer .
